  • Constructor Details

    • Pause

      public Pause​(GameArena panel, GamePlayer player, MainFrame window)
      create Pause page's components and achieve player's upgrade
      Parameters:
      panel - an instance of GameArena, pause page's components will be added to panel
      player - In pause page, player could get upgrade
      window - an instance of MainFrame. Pause page needs to get difficulty that stored in window

  • Method Details

    • quit

      public void quit​(GameArena panel)
      when pause page is closed, pause page's components will be removed
      Parameters:
      panel - is game's panel
